      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_3b74c706ceaa00a931074a9632c25a5f53edc8a0</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_3b74c706ceaa00a931074a9632c25a5f53edc8a0</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy source for muscle contraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiequelle für Muskelkontraktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Source d'énergie pour la contraction de muscle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fonte de energia para a contração do músculo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sorgente di energia per la contrazione del 
muscolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πηγή ενέργειας για τη συστολή μυών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuente de energía para la contracción del 
músculo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the amount of energy used during an exercise over a period of time. ATP, the source of energy, can come from stored creatine phosphatase, anaerobic respiration and from aerobic respiration.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anaerobic respiration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">creatine phosphatase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy source</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Menge von Energie 
verwendet während einer Übung über eine Zeitdauer von Zeit. 
Atp, die Quelle von Energie, kann von gespeicherter 
Kreatinphosphatase, anaerobe Atmung und von der aeroben Atmung kommen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre la quantité d'énergie
utilisée pendant un exercice sur une certaine période de temps. 
Le triphosphate d'adénosine, la source d'énergie, peut venir 
de la phosphatase enregistrée de créatine, respiration anaérobie et
de la respiration aérobie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a quantidade de energia
usada durante um exercício sobre um período de tempo. O ATP, a
fonte da energia, pode vir do phosphatase armazenado do creatine, 
respiração anaerobic e da respiração aerobic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra la quantità di 
energia usata durante l'esercitazione per un periodo di tempo. 
Il trifosfato di adenosina, la sorgente di energia, può venire 
dalla fosfatasi memorizzata della creatina, respirazione anaerobica e 
da respirazione aerobica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει το ποσό 
ενέργειας που χρησιμοποιείται κατά τη διάρκεια μιας άσκησης για 
μια χρονική περίοδο. Το ATP, η πηγή ενέργειας, μπορεί να
προέλθει από την καταχωρημένη φωσφατάση κρεατίνης, αναερόβια 
αναπνοή και από την αεροβική αναπνοή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la cantidad de 
energía usada durante un ejercicio durante tiempo. El ATP, la 
fuente de la energía, puede venir del phosphatase salvado de la 
creatina, respiración anaerobia y de la respiración aerobia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">anaerobe Atmung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreatinphosphatase</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energiequelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">triphosphate d'adénosine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">respiration anaérobie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phosphatase de créatine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">source d'énergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ATP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">respiração anaerobic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">phosphatase do creatine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fonte de energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trifosfato di adenosina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">respirazione anaerobica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fosfatasi della creatina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sorgente di energia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ATP</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αναερόβια αναπνοή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φωσφατάση κρεατίνης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πηγή ενέργειας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">atp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">respiración anaerobia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">phosphatase de la creatina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuente de energía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
